amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for implementing the 2003 revision of Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1917 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 408.

action.text: Amendment SA 1917 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S13091-13101, S13105-13106; text: CR S13092) To prohibit the use of funds for implementing the 2003 revision of Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76.
